thread.title: Is Daniel Craig done with James Bond?
thread.title_full: Is Daniel Craig done with James Bond? - Entertainment

author: ANI
title: Is Daniel Craig done with James Bond?
text:
Melbourne: Daniel Craig, who has played the role of British spy James Bond four times, has recently admitted that he would rather kill himself than taking up another 007 film.


Daniel Craig. Pic/Santa Banta 
On being asked, in a recent interview, whether he could imagine creating another Bond film, the 47-year-old actor replied that he would rather break a glass and slash his wrists, reports News.com.au.
He added that he is over it at that moment and wants to move on.
The 'Spectre' star further said that for at least a year or two he does not want to think about doing another Bond film and if he takes up another one, it would be only for money.
